LanguageData.Taggerung_SCP_ScariaImmunity.label: Grey Mechanite Immunity
LanguageData.Taggerung_SCP_ScariaImmunity.description: This person has been infected by the grey goo but instead of being dismantled or repurposes as a drone, they have inexplicably gained a biological immunity to the goo, and can no longer be internally possessed by the Goo mechanites. Regular Goo swarms will still continue to cause damage.
